parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the type of action processed by the trigger after activation (no action, a waypoints switch or an end of mission):

* <tt>"NONE"</tt>
* <tt>"EAST G"</tt> - Guarded by OPFOR - (It is better to use [[createGuardedPoint]] instead)
* <tt>"WEST G"</tt> - Guarded by BLUFOR - (It is better to use [[createGuardedPoint]] instead)
* <tt>"GUER G"</tt> - Guarded by Independent - (It is better to use [[createGuardedPoint]] instead)
* <tt>"SWITCH"</tt> - Switch waypoints/break loop (see [[ArmA:_Mission_Editor#Triggers_Mode_.28F3.29|Triggers]])
* <tt>"END1"</tt> - End #1
* <tt>"END2"</tt> - End #2
* <tt>"END3"</tt> - End #3
* <tt>"END4"</tt> - End #4
* <tt>"END5"</tt> - End #5
* <tt>"END6"</tt> - End #6
* <tt>"LOOSE"</tt> - (Meant to say LOSE but is misspelt in the game engine).
* <tt>"WIN"</tt> - (Not in editor. Valid enum name but when set, defaults to <tt>"END1"</tt>)
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setTriggerType''' action </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> action: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trigger [[setTriggerType]] "END1"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[triggerType]], [[createTrigger]], [[setTriggerActivation]], [[setTriggerArea]], [[setTriggerStatements]], [[setTriggerText]], [[setTriggerTimeout]], [[createGuardedPoint]], [[triggerInterval]], [[setTriggerInterval]], [[enableSimulation]], [[simulationEnabled]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
